attributes.action: Means test any further 4 x 4 tax and only apply to those abusing use of these vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charging £400 tax on 4x4 vehicles will simply mean the most expensive and consequently larger engined petrol 4x4's owned by higher earners will stay on the road as this is not a discouraging amount. Those on low incomes (and consequently smaller engine size due to the cost of fuel) that NEED a 4x4  day to day will be taxed away from them. This is a tax that unfairly favours the well off and penalises those on low incomes. Means testing and taxing as a % of earnings or value of vehicle would be far more effective.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
